mapper.select: select p.*, quantity from product p left join purchase pu on p.p_no=pu.p_no order by quantity desc limit 0,10
select id, image from (select * from product) p
mapper.insert: insert into product (id, title, content, image, price) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image}, #{price})
mapper.select: select p_no from product where id=#{id} and title=#{title} and content=#{content} and image=#{image} and price=#{price}
mapper.update: update product set view = view+1 where id=#{id}
